pullrequest.title: mass.py Add support for: Selenocysteine 'U' and Pyrrolysine 'O'

content.raw:
Thank you.

Note: `mass.calculate_mass` is noticeably inaccurate with average mass of `U`, apparently because the two most abundant isotopes of `Se` account for less than 75% of total abundance.
The average mass calculation may need improvement.
content.html:
Thank you.

Note: mass.calculate_mass is noticeably inaccurate with average mass of U, apparently because the two most abundant isotopes of Se account for less than 75% of total abundance. The average mass calculation may need improvement.
